page.title: 12Schools In Penarth
page.content: There are 16 schools in our "D" block. {NURSERY SCHOOLS.} Bute Cottage, Bute Lane 1972 (72) Cogan, Cawpore St. 1974 (95) {PRIMARY SCHOOLS.} Albert, Albert Rd., 1875 (285) Church in Wales,Plassey St.1863 (140) Cogan. Pill St., 1884 (205) Fairfield. Dryden Rd., 1953 (197) St.Joseph's R.C. Sully Rd., 1970(230) Victoria. Corneswell Rd., 1897 (285) Ysgol Gymraeg. Redlands Rd. 1973 (220) {COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS.} St. Cyres. St. Cyres Rd. 1958 (1643) Stanwell. Archer Rd., 1897 (1013) {SPECIAL SCHOOLS.} Ashgrove. Sully Rd.,(Deaf) 1973 (85) Lindens. Bradford Pl.(Problem)1974(21) Erw Delyn.St Cyres Rd.Ph.Han.1957(170) {PRIVATE SCHOOLS.} Westbourne Boys. Stanwell Rd.1890(190) Westbourne Girls. Victoria Rd. 1985.
